bomberman.game.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.game.graphics.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent each sprite. Creates static sprites so it only loads once.
    Author:
    andre

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(int size,
              int x,
              int y,
              SpriteSheet sheet)
        Create new sprite.
        Parameters:
        size - Sprite size. Used is 16 pixels.
        x - X coordinate in the sprite sheet
        y - Y coordinate in the sprite sheet.
        sheet - the corresponding sprite sheet.

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(int size,
              int color)
        Creates an unicolor sprite
        Parameters:
        size - Sprite size
        color - Sprite color
